alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Hill (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 6:30PM MDT until July 07 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Blaine County in north central Montana... Northeastern Hill County in north central Montana... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 629 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 33 miles north of Beaver Creek, or 35 miles northwest of Havre, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Blaine and northeastern Hill Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
